price: Ngaho nimurye mu minyago mwafashe, iziruwe kandi myiza. Munatinye Allah; mu by'ukuri, Allah ni Ubabarira ibyaha, Nyirimpuhwe.
arabic: فَكُلُواْ مِمَّا غَنِمۡتُمۡ حَلَٰلٗا طَيِّبٗاۚ وَٱتَّقُواْ ٱللَّهَۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ غَفُورٞ رَّحِيمٞ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: fakulū mimmā ghanim'tum ḥalālan ṭayyiban wa-ittaqū al-laha inna al-laha ghafūrun raḥīmun
